title: Please make a LAG emote.
body: I personally think it would be great to make a terrible play then flash an emote that says lag on it. Upvote if you agree.

replies.body: Honestly would be funny if they added this with a project or program skin

> [{quoted}](name=bob the great,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEEmQiLI,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-07-24T10:18:16.332+0000)
>
>Upvote if you agree.

Oh that's what that's for? I thought it was for colors {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
This could be an Ekko emote.
I'd like it for champions with who I don't have a mastery to flash when I fuck up
And a mind lag one too with a "?"
Just make it the little loading wheel in the client, make a tiny dial up signal
How would you describe lag with a champion's face though? A crying Hecarim or Rammus with a bear trap on their face?
This emote could be usefull now there's tft lol.

I feel itd be used less for that and more ironically, for stuff like getting a penta

Which is even better
ohhh a good idea...riot would never make it. like all good ideas. they throw them in the trash.
Lets give riot more money and basically say "Hey ya we totally agree with the changes you are making"
Use me as an ''I agree button''.

> [{quoted}](name=Blessed By RNG,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEEmQiLI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-07-24T14:50:58.780+0000)
>
> Use me as an ''I agree button''.

Or I could just upvote the post. Are you that desperate for upvotes?
